name: Sunburst Potion
description:
## Sunburst Potion

Add a touch of magic and wonder to your farming routine with this exciting and mysterious sunburst potion that's sure to surprise and delight.

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
[Bumpkins](https://docs.bumpkins.io/getting-started/about)
